DESCRIPTION: This card is Magic, it needs to take a check. Only Success makes sense unless there are other notes.
The power of magic man. Related to ALL check.
Do as the text after this whatever the check result is.
Your check result takes the max value of two tries.
Your check result takes the min value of two tries.
Cards like [/xx]. They are always Ethereal.
You throw a 1d20 dice, DC is your Magics. Some buffs can influence the result.
Let a monster throw a 1d20 dice, DC is your Magics. Some buffs can influence the result.
You are so lucky to have 20 in 1d20.
You are not so lucky to have 1 in 1d20.
